cast.original_title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
cast.overview: The starship Enterprise and its crew is pulled back into action when old nemesis, Khan, steals a top secret device called Project Genesis.
cast.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Kevin Rodney Sullivan (born August 3, 1958) is an American film and television actor and film director. He is married to wife Nita Sullivan, and has a daughter, Nicole L. Sullivan.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Kevin Rodney Sullivan, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia
